name: Video Player Pro
author: IdeaLand

sections.description:
A professional player is the best choice for professionalizing your videos. You have made the best choice.

Hi.
I will tell you why you made the best choice:

  • Change all your site’s videos with just one click
  • By installing this plugin you will get YouTube skin and for the near future we will put more skins
  • This player has extraordinary features and features that you can use except for general use on specialized sites such as training, introducing videos and media sites
  • Show your videos with 2 methods of media and external URLs
  • And over 10 other features….

ðŸ’ªðŸ¤ª it’s a professional and powerful player designed by the IdeaLand team and we’re getting better every day. You can have a professional player with the most creative ideas on the site and have fun

** This plugin has a special discount until March 29, 2021. This is a golden opportunity to professionalize your site videos **

View Demo Buy Pro Version

Free Version Features

  • Professional player with YouTube skin.
  • Change all your site’s videos with just one click.
  • Show more videos and suggestions in player.
  • Increase and decrease video playback speed.
  • Visibility control in public and private form for videos.
  • Features such as (information, watermark) in the player.
  • Custom right click.

Pro Plus Version Features

  • Professional player with YouTube skin.
  • Change all your site’s videos with just one click.
  • Create unlimited playlists.
  • Supports SRT for subtitles and multiple subtitles in different languages for a video.
  • Create comments for each video individually.
  • Incoming Traffic Monitoring & Visit Management System.
  • Show more videos and suggestions in player.
  • Create end screen on each video separately.
  • Create cards (video, links, playlists) for each video.
  • Professional timeline for editing and managing cards and end screen.
  • Multi-quality adjustment for video.
  • Increase and decrease video playback speed.
  • Features such as (sharing, information, watermark) in the player.
  • Custom URL feature for videos.
  • Ability to embed videos.
  • Ajax action feature for player.
  • Visibility control in public and private form for videos.
  • Custom right click.
  • View the video by entering the password
  • Schedule in the displays videos

What goes on in the admin?

Videos are very easy to manage and you can easily add and edit your videos. Consider different qualities for your videos
and add them to the playlists you have created. Provide tags for your videos so that the suggestion system works properly.
Of course, if you do not do this, it will automatically use the video title to suggest the most similar videos to the user.

If I want to introduce you to one of the best tools of this plugin, I will definitely tell you that they are subtitles
because you can easily introduce subtitle files (.srt) to your videos in different languages. There may be less language
that we do not support and you do not have to worry about it.

Why likes and comments? The best tool you can use to get your users’ feedback on the video is likes and comments.
Comments are recorded separately from WordPress comments and are provided separately for each video. Keep in mind that
likes and comments require the user to log in to the site.

Video analysis and control of incoming traffic can be an interesting feature in the plugin.
The meaning of the number of views is quite clear to us, but what does the incoming traffic mean for each video?
Videos have different modes for viewing:
* Use widgets and shortcodes on different pages and posts
* embed videos
* Cards and end screens
* Video suggestion
So videos can have different ways of being viewed, which is controlled by the traffic system and reports their ratio
to each other and the ratio of each video to other videos.

What do we have Elementor widget and shortcode?

  • Player (Widget Elementor/Shortcode)
  • Playlist (Widget Elementor/Shortcode)
sections.installation:
WordPress

  • Go to the plugin page
  • Click Add and then click Upload and select the plugin file
  • Activate it after uploading and extracting

FTP Server

  • Go to wp-content / plugin
  • Upload the plugin zip file and extract it
  • Go to the plugins page in the admin panel and enable the plugin
sections.faq:
How do I buy the pro version?

To buy the profThe only professional version of idea-land.co

How to request support?

Idea land is ready to support your products to solve your plugin problems. You can use three methods for support. (The first method is recommended for users of professional versions)

  • Log in to the account with which you purchased the plugin. Create a support in Manage Account > Support. (Fastest way to respond)
  • Use the email idealandtm@gmail.com In the subject line of the email, use the name of the plugin along with its subject.
  • You can request support through wordpress.org and we will respond to you. Professional version users are a priority, but we try to have the fastest response to you, otherwise we apologize for the long response time.

I don’t know how to work with the plugin, can you teach me?

We have put all the tutorials related to the plugin on our YouTube page
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Have Fun.

1.0.1

  • Fixed: Compatibility with all browsers

1.0.4

  • Add: Feature to change all site videos
  • Add: Right to left (Rtl) support
  • Add: Development capability for programmers
  • Add: Change the direction to the most landscape mode in full screen
  • Add: Sharing dialog added – PRO
  • Add: Automatic detection of rtl and ltr subtitles – PRO
  • Fixed: views and comments in the video list – PRO
  • Fixed: Show player (Preview) in elementor builder – PRO
  • Fixed: Change infrastructure and more flexibility
  • Fixed: Fixed minor issues

1.1.2

  • Add: Can create videos using external links

short_description: Change all site videos with one click - Has YouTube skin - Create unlimited playlists - Subtitle Support (SRT) - Multi Quality Support - Video Element …

upgrade_notice.1.0.4: We have tried to fix the problems and add new features. Update 1.0.4 is very important. Just install the plugin to change the skin of all your site videos
upgrade_notice.1.1.2: From now on, you can create videos using external links.
